snippet.title: Moroi | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
From our friends at Good Shepherd Entertainment and developer, Violet Saint, Moroi is a grimdark fairytale with an even darker sense of humor. Experience frantic combat, perplexing puzzles, and a twisting narrative anchored by a bizarre cast of characters. Can you break free from eternal madness? 

Follow Devolver Digital
X/Twitter:  https://twitter.com/devolverdigital
Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/DevolverDigital/
Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/devolverdigital/
TikTok:   https://www.tiktok.com/@devolverdigital

#indiegames #devolver #digital
